music.clear: Allows the use of ?queue clear and remove..

mod.log: Allows the ability to change log-related settings.
mod.minvite: Allows the ability to modify invite-related settings.

level.options: Allows the ability to modify level-related settings.

slowmode.set: Allows the ability to set a slowmode.

misc.setperm: Allows the ability to set permissions for roles.
misc.rules: Allows the ability to change the rules.
misc.star: Allows the ability to change starboard-related options.
misc.prefix: Allows the ability to change the bot's prefix.
misc.togglemsg: Allows the ability to switch on/off cooldown messages.
misc.welcome: Allows the ability to change welcome-related options.
misc.update: Allows the use of ?serverupdate and the ability to change the update channel.
misc.autorole: Allows the ability to change autorole-related options.
misc.invite: Allows the ability to bypass the deleteinvite config option.
